elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Unemployment insurance".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is unemployment insurance?
elements.correctAnswer: If you lose your job, you do not automatically receive unemployment benefits (so-called daily allowances). With the exception of university graduates, everyone has to prove that they were gainfully employed before becoming unemployed. The decisive factors for receiving daily allowances are how long you have been in employment and how old you are. In the event of redundancy, it is important to register with the relevant office as early as possible - depending on the canton, with the municipality of residence or the RAV.
